oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various Studio Recordings of: Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings - Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings (musicial group), and Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven (musicial group). The recording features Hardison performing takes of the tunes "Chirstene," "The House of Pink Lights," "Really (Part 1)," and "Really (Part 2)." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings; Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:02) Christene (Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings) -- (02:55) The House of Pink Lights (Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings) -- (05:46) Really (Part 1) (Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven) -- (08:04) Really (Part 2) (Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings (Musical group); Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven (Musical group);
